answers.answer: I am new to the group.. my baby is measuring small and if she is anything like her brother she will also be late. We are going to name her MarLea and I am hoping she comes no sooner than 1/1/11 =D. Thought I would join this group as I am on the border.EDD   12/30/10   GIRL - MarLea

Congrats girls! I feel like I'm the only one not finding out the sex!! At first I was desperate to know but now at nearly 24 weeks I'm over wanting to know and am looking forward to the surprise! I feel like it's a boy?? I will know for sure in about 16.5 weeks!! Hope everyone is well :)

thanks for the responses ladies! Dh and i thought about not finding out but the suspense was killing us! DS is my step son so this is my first and i just couldnt wait, i grew up with all boys and so i was praying it was a girl.  Do you have any names picked out yet Mum2CandS? How exciting to not know!Ok so far we haveeeeTeam Pink-Caralea with baby MarLea EDD 12-30-10Shayne1989 with baby Faith EDD 1-10-11Team Surprise-Mum2Cands with baby we will have to see EDD 1-8-11And welcome to the group Caralea! If i were on the border i would join both groups too =] Alot of us who are due in the first week or so could very well end up being December 2010 as well lol. Congrats everyone!

Shayne - what a GREAT idea!!  I kept meaning to do a list something like this (my other group knows me as the queen of lists - LOL).  So good to see you putting us all together!!We are having a baby girl and my EDD is 1-8-11And . . . I know this may sound odd, but I've never used by ticker before ~ just too scared too ~  so here, we go . . . first time for everything!!
Oh, and her name will be Evangeline Mae Ann.  You can use Evie Mae for short :)

eam Pink-ars1961 with baby Lillian Rose EDD 12-14-10Caralea with baby Marlea EDD 12-30-10bam1014  EDD is 1-8-11Shayne1989 with baby Faith EDD 01-10-11katsmommy with Izabella Grace EDD 1-23-11lifesconcerns with baby Malia May EDD between 12-24-10 and 01-7-11lin_z_ttc1 with baby Marley Lynn EDD 1-21-11Team BlueKathy421 EDD 1-15-11shaz4joe with baby CJ (Conner-Joe) EDD 1-28-11Bakerssquek with baby Parker EDD 1-14-11Team Surprise-Mum2Cands EDD 1-8-11Katsmommy- Yeah i was just thinking about that last night, come the end of december and then january its gunna be hectic haha. having a girl too due 26 jan naming her savannah rose but if i need c section she will be here a few weeks earlier
your on the girls list already...theres just so many of us its hard to tell lol
What a great list Shayne!  Good job :)  It will be so exciting when we begin to greet our little ones.What are the next big milestones?  Glucose test and baby showers??
my friend is doing me a baby shower on the 20th of November i never been to one before let alone it being my own one what to expect?  x

is anyone else starting to uncomfortably big? i just hit 6 months today and when i stand up my feet are no where to be seen and i have a H3LL of a time getting over the baby safety gate lolShaz4joe- Im not really sure what to expect either, since your having a boy i would expect to see alot of blue and green lol. Have you done a baby registry yet? Im having one around the same time. make sure to ask people, if they are going to get diapers and clothes, your usually going to want size 1 diapers and 0-3 months and 3-6 month clothes. My best friend got so many newborn clothes at her shower that her daughter could of worn a new outfit everyday until she grew out of them and STILL had stuff she'd never worn LOL. babies grow so fast and depending on how big your baby is won't need the newborn stuff for long

I've been to a couple of baby showers, but mine - at the end of October - will be my first for me.  They can be themed if you know the gender.  All depends on who's throwing it.  It is very similar to a bridal shower, only with babies instead - LOL.  Food, cake, presents and silly little games.  Usually you'll sit there and open up all your gifts in front of everyone.  Make sure that someone is helping you stay organized as to who gave what so you can send out the thank you cards.You will want to make sure that you have the registry done first and that your organizer lets the guests know where it is.  That makes sure that you get closer to what you want.  My MIL has the clothes dept WELL covered LOL, so I told the girl who was organizing mine to pass around the word that I didn't need any clothes and more practical things would be appreciated.  Of course, clothes are the cutest things to buy so that's usually what you'll get.
thank you and what do you mean by a registry? x

You go to a baby store, like Babies R Us or Target, they give you a little scanner "gun" and you get to point and scan everything you want!!  Lots of fun - LOL!  So then the store has a list of all the presents you are "asking" for.  People can go to the store, or look up online, and buy the things you want.
oh wow how cool is that x never new you could do that x

well my baby shower is nov 6th yay i cant wait lol and the sugar test is october 12th i am not looking forward to that one lol..but i am getting big and starting to swell,we went to do my registry today and i complained the whole time lol..my feet hurt,my back and for some odd eason my belly button lol but i got it done
MY BABY SHOWER IS IN A WEEK IN A HALF CANT WAIT MY SUGAR TEST IS THIS WEDNESDAY HOPE I PASS LOL
whats a sugar test? sorry never made it this far so dont now what to expect in this pregnancy x

shaz - it's a glucose test that you take between 24-28 weeks.  It tests for gestational diabetes.  You drink a big glass of nasty stuff and they test your blood.  Your doctor should mention it at your next appt.

okaii cheers x what was people feeling or is feeling at 21 weeks from there littlens i getting little worried not really been feeling my little man move some times i can but that last day been slight sort of movements and seems if i put hand on belly i will feel very slight movement x

I just turned 24 weeks and it hasn't been until this last week that I've felt consistent movement every single day (and even Sat she was being a poo, and not moving much at all).  Prior to that she would be really active one day and then nothing the next (and it would freak me out).  But from everything I've read that is normal.  So you might have a few more weeks before things start to become more consistent.

every baby is different too, they tell you not to start kick counts until was 26 or 28 weeks. I must have a little ninja girl because i've been feeling movement throughout the days since about 22 weeks.

Marley has a fairly predictable schedule I've noticed the past couple of weeks. In the morning between 10:00 and 12:00  in the afternoon around 4:00 to 6:00 and in the evening between 8:00 and 10:00 is when I feel the most consistent movement. Although she does tend to have lazy days where I don't feel too much of anything. If I want to feel her theres a few things I try, one, I'll drink ice cold water or tea or juice and wait 15 min, or eat something (cookies work well) and do the same. I've also found out over the past week that if I take my mp3 player and hold it close to my lower stomach (pant line) that she usually starts jumping before the song is over, lol.I'm having my glucose test next Tuesday, and hoping it turns out ok. They are doing mine slightly earlier than most because I have PCOS and am overweight to begin with. If it turns out I have GD then I'll deal with it, and do whatever I can to keep us both healthy. That and preeclampsia are my two biggest fears of pregnancy, but I just try to take it a day at a time.I have no idea when either of my showers are. I know that I'll get one at work and one my aunt and mom with throw me I just don't know when lol. I think I'll go and do a baby registry this weekend if nothing else is going on.I have been feeling SOOO big lately, its awful. If I'm laying down flat, I have to roll and heave myself up, lol. I feel off balance, and my ankles swell throughout the day. I don't dare look at myself naked, I seem to find new stretchmarks everytime I do, lol. I also have noooo energy to do anything! Oh well... I have a feeling my pregnancy is going to go by sooo fast, and I'll be back to myself, with a BABY! :0) Sometimes I'm still in total shock!

Yeah i'm the same way when laying on my back lin, and our couch in our living room is really comfy and cushy but when you sit your butt sinks in towards the back and you should see me try to get up LOL my younger brother who's 12 tried to help me up the other day and i nearly brought him down, i asked him the next day and he ran LOLLL. And with the stretch marks, i'm glad i can't see the undersude of my belly because i know i'm probably getting them there too, my hips have had small silvery ones since i lost 15 lbs in highschool and they are just traveling towards my belly haha. Oh the joys of pregnancy, its a good thing its all worth it haha
yea bella has her own little routine now to lol..at night starting around 8 she goes to town lol my husband loves watching her move around..but during the day i really dont feel much..
thank you i felt conner-joe move a bit tonight x i been going back and forward to the loo all night haha x i havent got any stretch marks yet but i been using bio oil alot x

Hi Ladies!I have a shower on Nov 13 and another shower Dec 11. One is from my family and the other is friends. I'm really grateful. I feel like I'm behind on getting things together. I have to empty out our office to convert into a nursery. We are moving the office downstairs into another room. I feel it should have been done yesterday. It's too early to be nesting right? HA!Feeling a lot of movement and it's fun. There is a pattern to it like you ladies mentioned. I still haven't been able to get my husband to feel it. Seems like as soon as he touches my belly the baby goes to sleep. I hope he has that effect on the baby when it is born! hAha.Not feeling to large and in charge yet. Just having a little back pain here and there. I can usually remedy that with some stretching. No stretch marks that I can see but I hear they come later for a lot of women.

I have a 2 showers comming up. One on 10/23 from my mom for her side of the family and family friends. Then I have another shower 11/13 that a friend is doing for me and our friends. I cant wait. These are my 1st baby showers, while being pregnant.When I had my son, we didnt know what we were having and the situation was rocky with his father and so the party was scheduled for after the babys; birth.. because my son was late, I had a welcome home party and meet baby all in one!
hey has anyone else been getting out of breath more? im not worrying to much about conner-joe today as felt him alot today hope this keeps up x

yeah i definitely do, my basement stairs have been kickin my butt lol from what i've read its pretty normal for where most of us are in our pregnancies, i dont know if its because our uterus is starting to push on our lungs or what but ugh it makes stairs a pain
Stairs are a pain!  Yep, definitely feeling a bit more winded these days.

yes i have been short on breath also..but the dr said it is normal and it will probley get worse lol..but i was thinking yesteday how i cant wait till i have this baby and started laughing because 6 months ago iwas doing everything i could to get pg lmao..but i a so glad all of us have come this far and it looks like we are having healthy babies

:-) i hope so after my two miscarrgies it was so hard and fort i wouldnt get this far and now im half way there and ababy boy on the way i can not wait for my little man to arrive (really looking forward to the bit where we write on here contrations started and then he/she is here and the pics up) x

question: I thought it would be cool to get a count of what all of us were having or who is going to let it be a surprise!I know we have alot of team pink this month but theres some team blue too! And a few team surprise!We are expecting a little girl =]
title: Lets see what everyones having!
